meanings.definition: A tool used for separating or marking off sections
meanings.sent1: I used the dividers to draw a straight line on my paper.
meanings.sent2: The teacher handed out dividers to help us with our geometry assignment.
meanings.sent3: The dividers decided to take a break and refused to mark any more sections.
meanings.sent4: Her words acted as dividers, creating a clear boundary between the two groups.
meanings.sent5: The sharp points of the dividers left precise marks on the map.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that divides or separates
meanings.sent1: The dividers in the group caused unnecessary conflicts.
meanings.sent2: The dividers between the two countries were finally removed, allowing free movement.
meanings.sent3: The dividers at the party kept switching sides, causing confusion.
meanings.sent4: His strict rules acted as dividers, isolating him from his peers.
meanings.sent5: The dividers in the family always found a way to create tension during gatherings.
